flawed_nl_solution:
The judge dismissed 2 cases, leaving 17 - 2 = <<17-2=51>>51 cases.
Of the remaining 51 cases, 2 / 3 * 51 = <<2/3*51=34>>34 were ruled innocent.
One ruling was delayed, so the judge ruled guilty on 51 - 34 - 1 = <<51-34-1=16>>16 cases.
#### 16

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
